title: Flatten a List
description: In Python, a list can contain other lists as elements. This is known as a nested list. Sometimes, we may need to flatten a nested list into a single list. In this challenge, you will be asked to write a function that flattens a list of lists once.

meta.title: Flatten a Nested List in Python
meta.description: Learn how to flatten a nested list in Python with a simple list comprehension function.
meta.keywords: flatten, python, list, list comprehension, nested list
